title: random dc
body:
was playing malp in ranked twisted threeline .All was going fine until suddenly some champs stopped moving . then the rest stopped my timer of death ran out but i didnt respawn. tried to leave game so i could rrelog but after the timer for that ran out game just stopped working. could move my mouse but nothing responded. i could crtl+alt+del but couldnt go to taskmanager so pressed the restart option and cancelled that after it closed lol. i tried to lauch lol again but nothing happened even after closing all secret runners of it in taskmanager. i noticed that webpages were loadingslowly so i replugged ethernetkable , wificonnecterbox my ethernetcable was in , put on and of wifi , the works now my webpages were loading quick again but lol still wouldnt lauch. now atleast it showed the little logo you get before you can go to loggin but it kept going on lolex is not responding . after trying again sometimes i got this message Failed to load URL "https://riot:0e337b22f2b36b70@127.0.0.1:51932/index.html" with error "unknown error code -21" (-21). tried again a few times more then it just started working again loaded the game that was still going because enemy team had a shitcomp and no teamwork and didnt had a single problem for the rest of game. our shyv dc'd for a sec though a bit after i relogged but that was all. when game was over i had to loggin again instead of going to the postgamestream

Can be its just me or my pc but with having had a few probs with client at the start i tought i would just trow it out here incase it happens to more people.

replies.body: The client is independent of the game itself, and it sounds like you might be having packet loss or some connection problem that's causing this issue for you.  Try a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for the matches this is happening in for an overview of what's going on.  Let me know what you find.

Your average ping was NaN milliseconds, which means your ping was good overall.

The worst ping you experienced was -Infinityms. This indicates your connection was stable for this game.

This is what it said for this game. I checked a few loggs of other games and they all gave numbers and graphs and said everything was fine except  1 game where i had a tiny bit of lag

Something doesn't seem right all; I haven't seen a result with no applicable number and infinity ms.  I do feel that you might be having some form of network problem causing these issues; though, I'm not sure what those results are telling us.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can help out.  We'll reply back asap!

The problems i had last week that i was talking about was 2 games where i lost connection because i still had to plug in my ethernetcable and couldnt reconnect to game i could log into client but loadingscreen kept crashing until that game was over and  i could start a new one. Then i had 1 game where i kept crashing in loadingscreen because client hadnt patched .
